General.Name: Garovaglio y Zorroaquin
General.Description: Garovaglio y Zorraquín S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the commercial, real estate and financial, agricultural, petrochemical, and construction businesses in Argentina. It manufactures and commercializes water heaters, heaters, hot water tanks, and convectors. The company was founded in 1924 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Avda. Del Libertador 6570, Buenos Aires, Argentina
